context: The word 'nädalal' is an adessive singular form in Estonian that means 'at/on/in/with the week'. It's used to indicate something happening during the current week. In the examples, 'sellenädalane' (this week's) and 'sellenädalast' (from this week) are related forms. The word is commonly used to specify temporal reference to the present week in everyday speech and writing.
